explanation: [0-0] On a rooftop, a man in a blue shirt, jeans, and slippers stands on a round concrete platform. He stands with his hands clenched in fists at his sides, looking ahead. The background is a slightly dilapidated brick wall with some potted plants. To the left is an air conditioner unit, and above is a blue sky.

[0-3] First, the man in the blue shirt runs in place. At this moment, a pile of potato chips falls from the sky on the right. The man looks up, opens his mouth toward the chips, and the chips shrink and enter his mouth. A leg wearing jeans and slippers moves from the lower right corner to the middle left, and then out of the left side. A bee falls from the sky on the left. The man looks up and raises his right hand to swat the bee away from the left. A pile of cashews falls from the sky on the right. The man looks up and opens his mouth at the pile of cashews. The pile shrinks and enters his mouth.

After that, the man's head moves from the left to the top and disappears. Several biscuits fall from the right sky. The man looks up and opens his mouth towards the biscuits. The biscuits shrink and enter his mouth. At this time, the man's head moves from the left to the top and falls down. The man catches it with both hands and puts it on the body on the left.
